innate_traits: Naive, Curious, Empathetic, Compulsively Generous, Idealistic
lifestyle: Wakes up at 6:30 AM, eats a quick breakfast while reviewing emails before heading to work by 8:00 AM. Often takes on extra responsibilities to help colleagues and enjoys lunchtime chats. After work, they engage in video games or fitness classes to relieve stress, followed by dinner. Despite aiming for a 10:00 PM bedtime, they often stay up later to read or watch shows, resulting in inconsistent sleep patterns.
learned_traits: Under pressure to perform, Confident, Adaptable
